item.title: Sarah add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "Eagles may soar, but weasels don't get sucked into jet engines." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Sarah add a quote by <unknown>
item.description: "The optimist says the glass is half full. The pessimist says the glass is half empty. The engineer says the glass is twice as large as it needs to be." -- <unknown>

item.title: Sarah add a quote by John Cleese
item.description: "Technology frightens me to death. It's designed by engineers to impress other engineers. And they always come with instruction booklets that are written by engineers for other engineers — which is why almost no technology ever works." -- John Cleese

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Lance Armstrong
item.description: "Anyone who imagines they can work alone winds up surrounded by nothing but rivals, without companions. The fact is, no one ascends alone." -- Lance Armstrong

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by H.G. Wells
item.description: "Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race." -- H.G. Wells

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Susan B. Anthony
item.description: "Let me tell you what I think of bicycling. I think it has done more to emancipate women than anything else in the world. It gives women a feeling of freedom and self-reliance. I stand and rejoice every time I see a woman ride by on a wheel…the picture of free, untrammeled womanhood." -- Susan B. Anthony

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "My Best Friend is a person who will give me a book I have not read." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Elections belong to the people. It's their decision. If they decide to turn their back on the fire and burn their behinds, then they will just have to sit on their blisters." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Laughter is the language of the soul." -- Pablo Neruda
